Polonius said:

> > And it must follow, as the night the day,

regular_tests.name: fenced_complexly_nested_quote
regular_tests.input:
I heard about this second hand...
~~~ quote

He said:
~~~ quote
The customer is complaining.

They looked at this code:
``` 
def hello(): print 'hello
```
They would prefer:
~~~
def hello()
  puts 'hello'
end
~~~

Please advise.
~~~

She said:
~~~ quote
Just send them this:
```
echo "hello
"
```
~~~
regular_tests.expected_output:
I heard about this second hand...

He said:

The customer is complaining.

They looked at this code:

def hello(): print 'hello

They would prefer:

def hello()
puts 'hello'
end

Please advise.

She said:
~~~ quote
Just send them this:
```
echo "hello
"
```
regular_tests.text_content:
I heard about this second hand...
> He said:
> > The customer is complaining.
> > They looked at this code:
> > def hello(): print 'hello
> > They would prefer:
> def hello()
>   puts 'hello'
> end

Please advise.
She said:
~~~ quote
Just send them this:
```
echo "hello
"
```

regular_tests.name: ulist_with_inline_code
regular_tests.input:
gonna take a break for a bit--all yours if you want to play around too. what I did:

* install cmake
* git clone zulip desktop
* run `cmake-gui ..` in `c:\zulip\zulip-desktop\msvcbuild`
* hit configure/generate until it generated the msvc project (had to make a fix to some cmake files)
* opened vs2013 
* tried to build
regular_tests.expected_output:
gonna take a break for a bit--all yours if you want to play around too. what I did:

  • install cmake
  • git clone zulip desktop
  • run cmake-gui .. in c:\zulip\zulip-desktop\msvcbuild
  • hit configure/generate until it generated the msvc project (had to make a fix to some cmake files)
  • opened vs2013
  • tried to build
regular_tests.text_content:
gonna take a break for a bit--all yours if you want to play around too. what I did:

install cmake
git clone zulip desktop
run cmake-gui .. in c:\zulip\zulip-desktop\msvcbuild
hit configure/generate until it generated the msvc project (had to make a fix to some cmake files)
opened vs2013 
tried to build

CSS + PHP
```html+php
  $var = function($var, 'string');
```
HTML + PHP
```javascript+php

```

```

  $var = function($var, 'string');
```
